items.title: Personal Responsive Website Template
items.description: A modern, responsive website template suitable for personal and business websites. Built with the latest HTML5 and CSS3 technologies to ensure excellent display across all types of devices.

items.title: VGA Snake Game Based on FPGA
items.description: A VGA Snake game based on FPGA, developed using Verilog. This project demonstrates how to implement a simple graphical interface and user interaction on a hardware platform.

items.title: Dual-domain digital signal processing-video enhancement based on MATLAB
items.description: A dual-domain digital signal processing project based on MATLAB, focused on video enhancement. The project leverages dual-domain techniques to improve video quality, including operations such as denoising and sharpening.
